content: granny gets funky on these delicious crochet pants featured in red heart all in one granny square all you have to do is crochet - no color changes required to achieve perfect 6 granny squares you ll do chain double_crochet and granny stitch techniques to create and join your motifs then simply add your choice of edging using red heart super saver it s a distinctive statement piece in any closet red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m gauge motif = approx 6 15 cm square
